channel.title: Teaching on Joel Mackenzie
channel.description: Recent content in Teaching on Joel Mackenzie

item.title: Teaching
item.description: The University of Queensland I was the course coordinator and lecturer for COMP3506/COMP7505: Algorithms & Data Structures during semester 2, 2023, 2024, and 2025. In 2025, I co-lectured this course with Dr Joshua Arnold. I was the course coordinator and lecturer for CSSE7610: Concurrency: Theory and Practice with Brae Webb in semester 2, 2025. I was the course coordinator and lecturer for DATA7001: Introduction to Data Science with Dr Xin Guo during semester 1, 2023.
